_sText:
Welcome to bhop\_fury\_2 !
--------------------------

### WARNING
__________________________________________________
This map does NOT contain a bhop once system.

This map does NOT contain forced longjumps.

This map does NOT contain weirdjump or ladders.
__________________________________________________

If you expect something like this, go and play a bhop\_kz\_map.



This map is an oldschool bhop map with mpbhops.
It's made for legit servers with 100 tick and sv\_airaccelerate 100.


### Why did I made such a map and not a bhop\_kz\_map?

This is very simple. Because people asked me to. A lot of people told me that they really like bhop\_fury and are hungry for more like that.

So here it is. bhop\_fury\_2 uses the same design and same gameplay as bhop\_fury.

Features of the map:

-  Longjump section (240-270 in 5 unit steps)

- 22 bhop and 2 short xc levels

- First level is skippable to be noobfriendly (costs more time then doing it)

- 9 chilling songs (can be restarted at every level, and random music button for longjump section)

- Optimized with nodraw, func\_detail, areaportals and hint&skip


I hope you have fun with this map!

If you like my work, please subscribe.

Dotty


Because of a broken entity and a not working telepoter, I decided to fix the map and change the file.

Please redownload the file! It is fixed now. 

Sorry for that
